briefdescription.para: Underlying number type.
Associated size2d type.
Associated point2d type.
Associated angle type.
Constructs new vector with zero coordinates.
Constructs new vector from given scalar values.
Constructs new vector, setting all components to the same value.

parameterdescription.para: The value to set all components to.

briefdescription.para: Constructs new vector from size2d.
Constructs new vector from point2d.

memberdef.argsstring: (F &&fn) const -> std::enable_if_t< std::is_invocable_v< F, number_type >, vector2d< decltype(fn(std::declval< number_type >()))>>
memberdef.name: map

briefdescription.para: Applies the function fn to each component of the vector2d.

parameterdescription.para: The type of function to apply.

briefdescription.para: Applies the function fn to each component of this vector2d and the other vector2d.

parameterdescription.para: The type of function to apply.

briefdescription.para: Casts this vector to a size2d.

simplesect.para: The size2d representation of this vector.

briefdescription.para: Casts this vector to a point2d.

simplesect.para: The point2d representation of this vector.

briefdescription.para: Returns this vector3d's length squared.

simplesect.para: The length squared of this vector3d.

briefdescription.para: Returns this vector3d's length as scalar value.

simplesect.para: The length of this vector3d.

briefdescription.para: Returns inverted vector2d.

simplesect.para: Inverted vector2d.

briefdescription.para: Returns the x-coordinate of the vector2d as scalar value.

simplesect.para: The x-coordinate of the vector2d.

briefdescription.para: Returns the y-coordinate of the vector2d as scalar value.

simplesect.para: The y-coordinate of the vector2d.

briefdescription.para: Returns mutable reference to the x-coordinate of the vector2d as scalar value.

simplesect.para: Mutable reference to the x-coordinate of the vector2d.

briefdescription.para: Returns mutable reference to the y-coordinate of the vector2d as scalar value.

simplesect.para: Mutable reference to the y-coordinate of the vector2d.

briefdescription.para: Returns string representation of the vector2d.

detaileddescription.para:
Size is represented as it's numeric values. If the underlying number type is floating vector2d, it is rounded to two decimal places.
Due to limitations of the language, units are not displayed.
String representation of the object.

briefdescription.para: Casts into an array of two values.
Casts into a tuple of two values.
Casts into a pair of two values.
Rounds each component to the nearest integer value.

detaileddescription.para: This behavior is preserved for negative values (unlike the basic cast).

briefdescription.para: Rounds each component to the smallest integer equal or greater than the original value.

detaileddescription.para: This behavior is preserved for negative values (unlike the basic cast).

briefdescription.para: Rounds each component to the largest integer equal or less than the original value.

detaileddescription.para: This behavior is preserved for negative values (unlike the basic cast).

briefdescription.para: Linearly interpolate between this vector2d and another vector2d.

detaileddescription.para:
Output: [-8.0,24.0] [0.0,10.0] [4.0,3.0] [8.0,-4.0] [16.0,-18.0]
other
The other vector2d.
t
Interpolation factor.
The interpolated vector2d.

briefdescription.para: Returns the largest x and y values of this and another vector2d.

simplesect.para: vector2d with the largest x and y values.

briefdescription.para: Returns the smallest x and y values of this and another vector2d.

simplesect.para: vector2d with the smallest x and y values.

briefdescription.para: Returns the vector2d each component of which clamped by corresponding components of start and end.

simplesect.para: The clamped vector2d.

briefdescription.para: Returns dot product of this and another vector2d.

simplesect.para: The dot product of this and another vector2d.

briefdescription.para: Returns the norm of the cross product of this and another vector2d.

detaileddescription.para:
Cross product is defined as [x1, y1] x [x2, y2] = x1 * y2 - y1 * x2.
other
The other vector2d.
The norm of the cross product of this and another vector2d.

briefdescription.para: Returns the absolute value of each component.

simplesect.para: The absolute value of each component.

briefdescription.para: Returns this vector projected onto another vector.

simplesect.para: The projection of this vector onto the other vector.
Projecting onto a zero vector will result in a division by zero.

briefdescription.para: Returns the norm of the cross product of this and another vector2d.

detaileddescription.para:
Cross product is defined as [x1, y1] x [x2, y2] = x1 * y2 - y1 * x2.
other
The other vector2d.
The norm of the cross product of this and another vector2d.

briefdescription.para: Returns true if all members are finite.
Returns true if all members are positive.
Constructs new vector2d from std::array.

parameterdescription.para: The size of the std::array. Must be equal to 2.

briefdescription.para: Returns true if underlying values is both not 0 and not NaN or Infinity in case of floating point.

simplesect.para: Also returns false if underlying values is NaN or Infinity in case of floating point.

briefdescription.para: Returns false if underlying values is both not 0.
Returns the signed angle between this vector and another vector.

simplesect.para: The signed angle between this vector and the other vector.

briefdescription.para: Returns the signed angle between this vector and the x axis.

detaileddescription.para:
Positive values counted counterclockwise, where 0 is +x axis, and PI/2 is +y axis.
The signed angle between this vector and the x axis.

briefdescription.para: Returns the vector with length normalized.

simplesect.para: The normalized vector.

briefdescription.para: Returns a reflection vector using an incident ray and a surface normal.

simplesect.para: The reflection vector.

briefdescription.para: Cast from one numeric representation to another, preserving the units.

simplesect.para: The vector2d with the new number type and the same value.

Casts into i64 vector2d.
Casts into isize vector2d.

simplesect.para: An unchanged copy of this vector.

briefdescription.para: Returns a negated copy of this vector.

simplesect.para: A negated copy of this vector.

briefdescription.para: Returns true if the vector is not equal to the other vector.

simplesect.para: true if the vector is not equal to the other vector.

briefdescription.para: Adds vector and either point2d, size2d or vector2d.

parameterdescription.para: The type of the summand. Can be point2d, vector2d or size2d.

simplesect.para: The sum.

briefdescription.para: Returns true if the vector is equal to the other vector.

simplesect.para: true if the vector is equal to the other vector.

briefdescription.para: Subtracts vector and either point2d, size2d or vector2d.

parameterdescription.para: The type of the subtrahend. Can be point2d, vector2d or size2d.

simplesect.para: The difference.

briefdescription.para: Multiplies vector by a scalar.

simplesect.para: The result of multiplication.

briefdescription.para: Divides vector by a scalar.

simplesect.para: The result of division.

briefdescription.para: Adds vector and either point2d, size2d or vector2d.

simplesect.para: The sum.

briefdescription.para: Subtracts vector and either point2d, size2d or vector2d.

parameterdescription.para: The type of the subtrahend. Can be point2d, vector2d or size2d.

briefdescription.para: A two-dimensional vector tagged with a unit.

parameterdescription.para: Number type. Must satisfy concept rolly::concepts::num. Default is f32.
